alert.note: Alert for Adams; Clarke; Decatur; Ringgold; Taylor; Union (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 12 at 10:31PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Decatur, Union, Adams, Ringgold, Taylor and western Clarke Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1030 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of Lake Icaria to near Corning to near Hopkins. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Creston, Lenox and Green Valley Lake around 1045 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Sun Valley Lake, Osceola, Lakeside Casino and Lamoni. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 1 and 2, and between mile markers 40 and 43. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for south central and southwestern Iowa.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Clarke; Decatur; Ringgold; Taylor; Union
